name: Sneaky Archers Battle Royale
description:
Fight your way to be the last one standing in a randomly generated maze covered in darkness, always stay out of sight and don't get caught up in the light.
There are 4 unique bows and 3 unique helmets with 5 rarity levels that can be combined to create very diffrent playstyles that suits each player.

CONTROLS:

WASD - move around
E - open crates/equip items
LeftClick - shoot arrow
Y - Toggle free camera On/Off

This is still in early development that means this is and incomplete and unpolised game.

SFX are not implemented except for footstepts.

There si not matchmaking yet, you can Create/Join/Join Random servers.
